name: Glory Hunters
storyline:
A massive object threatens to strike Earth, and the call to action is clear: “Rise, Hunter.” Knights and warriors from around the globe embark on perilous journeys to the ancient gods' vessels in search of their blessings during this dire time. These brave souls are known as the Glory Hunters.

As fire engulfs the sky signaling the world's impending doom, it falls to you to locate one of the four godly vessels in the land of Glorianta and avert catastrophe. Each choice and path you take weaves into the fabric of this epic saga, inviting you to become a legend in your own right.
summary: Glory Hunters is an innovative action-adventure RPG designed for the original GameBoy. It introduces a distinctive and original gameplay twist: progression is driven by earning achievements.
